channel.title: Social War Community Tones Development Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Social War Community Tones Development Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: online communities
item.description: i guess I still need to write that paper on online communities and the socialization of online relationships. Especially in light of friendster and the development of virtual “ubermensch.” heh. I guess I wasn’t clear in what I was saying. I am naive enough to jump to the conclusion that I can use the idea of the ubermensch when talking about online communities.. when discussing the idea of ubermensch or overmen.
